description: abstract image; large gray shape that encompasses most of the top half of print, bottle-necking downward toward the bottom center; aqua background; patchy green rectangular shape in bottom center; two red, patchy circles on right; black diamond shapes in center left, with dark, abstract shapes in center left; mottled green and red shapes, some in the form of diamond shapes, placed within a horizontal black 'window' across the top of the image; several smaller black shapes encased in a crescent-shaped green band of pigment in top center; Japanese characters written in pencil in bottom center margin
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: LRC of sheet, in pencil: Y. Kumagai Gorō | LLC of image: Y. Kumagai Gorō
title: Phantom "A"
